page.title: 14Policing L.parish H.priors
page.content: 04400144 The D-Block is policed by officers based at Whitchurch and Andover.A {police constable}lives in Hurstbourne Priors and he patrols the D-Block and St.Marybourne.He uses a {200cc motor {cycle.}There is a {special constable} in Longparish who helps voluntarily with such things as traffic control at local functions.The {commonest crime {is theft from motor cars. }A few house burglaries are committed.A volvo police car from Andover patrols an area including and a second car (Ford Escort ) stands by.A separate traffic{unit }of 4 cars and 2 11,000cc B.M.W. motorcycles patrols the region. { C.I.D officers }are based at Andover.
